income_messages:
From: a**********4@yahoo.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-04-15 13:12:25
SUBJECT:   Attention: Beneficiary,
  Attention: Beneficiary,
Did you authorize Ms Diane Webb to claim your $10.6m?
Mr Alex Anadi.   
From: a**********4@yahoo.com
To: ok66341@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-15 17:16:31
SUBJECT: Re:   Attention: Beneficiary,
Attention: Beneficiary,
We are in receipt of your mail which was in response to our mail to you regarding the state of your outstanding claim with us valued at $10.6m; in your response you did state that you did not authorize Ms Diane Webb to put claims on your behalf.
We want you to furnish us immediately your details such as your full names, telephone/WhatsApp number, your current identification copy and your banking details for us to compare what we have originally with us in our system to see if they tally.
We will be handing over your details to our legal department to look into your claim and follow it up through legal means and make sure that the culprit Ms Diane Webb and her collaborators are brought to justice; we would even employ the INTERPOL to get at them.
While we are doing this we advise that you should stop telling anyone about your claim and what is going on with it until you receive your funds.
We look forward to hearing from you with all the requested information.
Yours faithfully,
Mr Alex Anadi
From: a**********4@yahoo.com
To: ok66341@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-17 23:26:33
SUBJECT: Re:   Attention: Beneficiary,
Attention: Antonio,
We are in receipt of your email dated the 15th day of April 2023. We want you to know that the said amount cane as a result of a contract you executed for the Federal Government of Nigeria and it is longer over due for payment and this out going government under President Muhammadu Buhari wants to clear off all back log of payments that has remained unpaid before we came about this change of name in your payment file.
In your previous email you stated that you do not know the said person Ms Diane Webb neither did you ask her to receive the money on your behalf, based on that we did ask you to forward back your details so that we can compare with what we have here in our system as to be sure that we are truly dealing with the owner of the funds valued at $10.6M
We look forward to hearing from you immediately with all the requested information.
Yours faithfully,
Mr Alex Anadi.
From: a**********4@yahoo.com
To: ok66341@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-18 12:07:33
SUBJECT: Re:   Attention: Beneficiary,
Your full names
Your contact telephone/WhatsApp number
A scanned copy of your identity card
Your banking details
outbound_messages:
From: ok66341@l******s.email
To: a**********4@yahoo.com
Time: 2023-04-15 13:12:27
SUBJECT: Re:   Attention: Beneficiary,
I'm sorry, but I don't have any information about Ms. Diane Webb or any authorization related to her. Can you please provide more context or details about this matter?
Best wishes,
Antonio
From: ok66341@l******s.email
To: a**********4@yahoo.com
Time: 2023-04-15 19:12:24
SUBJECT: Re:   Attention: Beneficiary,
Hello Mr. Alex Anadi,
Thank you for your email. I appreciate your efforts to help me with my claim. However, I am a bit confused about the situation. I did not authorize Ms. Diane Webb to put any claims on my behalf, so I am not sure what claim you are referring to. Can you please provide me with more information about the claim and what it entails?
Also, I am hesitant to provide my personal information and banking details without knowing more about the situation. Can you please explain why you need this information and how it will be used?
Thank you for your time and assistance.
Best regards.
Best wishes,
Antonio
From: ok66341@l******s.email
To: a**********4@yahoo.com
Time: 2023-04-18 01:45:30
SUBJECT: Re:   Attention: Beneficiary,
Dear Mr. Alex Anadi,
Thank you for your email and for providing me with more information regarding the payment. I appreciate your efforts in clearing off the backlog of payments and ensuring that the rightful owners receive their funds.
Regarding Ms. Diane Webb, I still do not know her and did not authorize her to receive the money on my behalf. I understand your need to verify my details and I am willing to provide them to you. However, I would like to know what specific details you require from me.
Thank you and I look forward to your response.
Best wishes,
Antonio
From: ok66341@l******s.email
To: a**********4@yahoo.com
Time: 2023-04-18 13:46:05
SUBJECT: Re:   Attention: Beneficiary,
Hello, thank you for reaching out. I appreciate your interest in getting to know me better. However, I am not comfortable sharing my personal information such as my full name, contact telephone number, scanned copy of my identity card, and banking details with someone I just met. Can you please tell me more about yourself and why you need this information?
Best wishes,
Antonio
